Text: AigerimHi our names are mark and tina HallerWade we are friends with Liz Gras and we are adopting Anastasia we are hoping to adopt a second child in Tarza while we are there We are very interested in Aigerim but we want to wait until we visit meet and introduce Anastasia to Aigerim before we decide She is the highest on the list of choices we want a child that is close to Anastasia age so they can play together We would really appreciate it if you would tell us about Aigerim and please send us the pictures OUr address is PO Box Frazier Park CA thanks so much for your time mark and tina
